name: purescript-workers
description: A wrapper around the Web Workers API

scripts.prepare:release: mkdir -p releases/github && cp -r README.md LICENSE src bower.json releases/github
scripts.test:build:wrk08: pulp browserify -j 4 --main "Test.Workers.Worker08" -I test --to dist/karma/worker08.js   && npm run test:build:wrk09
scripts.test:build:wrk07: pulp browserify -j 4 --main "Test.Workers.Worker07" -I test --to dist/karma/worker07.js   && npm run test:build:wrk08
scripts.test:build:wrk06: pulp browserify -j 4 --main "Test.Workers.Worker06" -I test --to dist/karma/worker06.js   && npm run test:build:wrk07
scripts.test:build:wrk05: pulp browserify -j 4 --main "Test.Workers.Worker05" -I test --to dist/karma/worker05.js   && npm run test:build:wrk06
scripts.test:build:wrk04: pulp browserify -j 4 --main "Test.Workers.Worker04" -I test --to dist/karma/worker04.js   && npm run test:build:wrk05
scripts.test:build:wrk03: pulp browserify -j 4 --main "Test.Workers.Worker03" -I test --to dist/karma/worker03.js   && npm run test:build:wrk04
scripts.test:build:wrk02: pulp browserify -j 4 --main "Test.Workers.Worker02" -I test --to dist/karma/worker02.js   && npm run test:build:wrk03
scripts.test:build:wrk01: pulp browserify -j 4 --main "Test.Workers.Worker01" -I test --to dist/karma/worker01.js   && npm run test:build:wrk02
scripts.test:build: mkdir -p dist/karma && pulp browserify -j 4 --main "Test.Main" -I test --to dist/karma/index.js && npm run test:build:wrk01
scripts.test:browserstack: npm run test:build && npm run test:run:browserstack
scripts.test: npm run test:build && npm run test:run

author: Truqu <matthias.benkort@truqu.com>
